title: Project Management - Weekly Status Update
description: A project manager needs to provide a weekly status update to a client for an ongoing project.

tasks.description: Review the project plan and get status updates on all active tasks from the assigned technicians.
tasks.expected_outcome: The project manager has a clear picture of the week's progress.

tasks.description: Update the project's RAG status (Red, Amber, Green) and note any new risks or issues.
tasks.expected_outcome: The project's health status is accurately updated.

tasks.description: Send a concise status summary email to the client's main point of contact.
tasks.expected_outcome: The client is kept informed of the project's progress.
